data.eml:eml: Definition of the Bradysia luctifica group (Diptera, Sciaridae), with the description of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vilkamaa, Pekka, Suuronen, Anna (2019): Definition of the Bradysia luctifica group (Diptera, Sciaridae), with the description of five new species. Zootaxa 4576 (1): 151-161, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4576.1.8
